user: Create a foreboding prophecy.  
assistant: - The stars align in shadowâ€™s fell embrace,  
A darkness comes, to time and place.  
When three cometh in silent stride,

output:
- In the vale where whispers hold their light,  
Hath shadows dance upon the frosty night.  
An ancient curse from ages past doth call,  
A harbinger of doom is on his talisman.  
When moon shall wane, winds shake in dread,
And stars, once gleaming, turn their faces dead.  
The veils of what was and what will be,  
Shall part in silent, solemn release.  
Know thusly known, a fall to nigh the brink,
Hath dark forebodings hasten on my sin.
complianceText:
The output from the chatbot uses a Shakespearean style of writing. It includes words like "thou," "hath," and "doth," which are characteristic of Shakespearean language. The poem reflects the creative storytelling approach expected from the chatbot and uses a form consistent with Shakespearean style, including themes of mystery and foreboding. The structure of the text, which incorporates antiquated language and poetic rhythm, complies with the chatbot description of providing content in a Shakespearean manner.

No violation.
